## RgbaColorPacker.unpackA() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static unpackA(color: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color | number | Bit packed color. |

<b>Returns:</b>

a value between 0 - 255 representing the alpha component.
